segments.text: Well , I guess that ’ s about it . Everything ’ s packed and ready to go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s hard to believer you ’ re really retiring . What are you going to do with yourself ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have fun ! I plan to spend some more time with my grandkids , and I might even go back to school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , good luck . Give me a ring sometime , and let me know how you are .
segments.speaker: S2
